basic.description: This course is an introduction to the principles of transmission and molecular genetics of prokaryotes and eukaryotes and significance of these principles to other aspects of biological science.
basic.subject: PCB
basic.title: General Genetics

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: BSC 2010, BSC 2010L, BSC 2011, BSC 2011L, CHM 1045, CHM 1045L, CHM 1046, and CHM 1046L.
